connect20/joomlartmegamenu.name: connect20/JoomlartMegaMenu

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/joomlartmegamenu.description: If you want to improve your online store usability and navigation, JM Mega Menu extension is exactly what you need. It offers the most effective way to organize the products and categories.
